entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY AND MUCH COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

SHOWERS LIKELY
BREEZY AND MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
